::KitKat::

She smiled at Phobia, "Yes. That is a good plan. We shall go with 
that. See if you can't contact the others and get them here as soon 
as possable.  Once they get here, we can go and put an end to 
Megatron once and for all."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia knew that question was coming. "Why both of course, we 
already 
> have an operative discussing things with the alliance and we can 
work 
> our edge here without much effort we'll have them both playing for 
> the same goal, we can pick a more permanent interest when we've 
> accomplished a common goal, the death of Megatron."
>

suddenly
